page.title: 14SKERRIES SHOPS AND P.O.
page.content:
Skerries has two shops. They both sell a variety of things{vegetables, {clothes, shoes, boots, sweets,food {juice,frozen foods,jewellery and{toys.}The boat comes twice a week with the load for both shops. One shop keeper moves his stores from the boat to the shop with a{wheelbarrow.}The other moves her stores with a{tractor {and trailer}and some times with a{car.
Something else that comes on the boat is the{mail.}We get our mail at night at the same time as the stuff comes to the shop. We only get mail on Tuesday and Friday and we put out mail on the same days. Our Post Office is in a garden shed next to the council houses.
